timeline.bodyText: Is it needed to wrap the exception in a RuntimeException, can we just remove the catch?
timeline.author: hatyo

replies.bodyText: I removed that as part of the refactoring to address other comments
replies.author: dgomezferro

timeline.bodyText: Does version need to be re-read on every call? Can it be an instance, or even static, variable similar to OlapServerMaster?
timeline.author: OlegMazurov

replies.bodyText: I initialize a keepAlive message prototype once in the beginning with the version information and then use that to generate the payload with the time, so we only access the version once per OlapServer lifetime.
replies.author: dgomezferro
